mod.name: TestMod
mod.credits:
localization:
彼君不触 (Simplified Chinese)
brkfox (English)
彼君不触 (English)
mod.description:
You may choose relic or card reward and then choose 1 from 3 of that type from this mod at start of each run. Require 'STSLib'. 

开局选择遗物或无色牌之后可以再进行一次对应的可放弃的3选1来获得初始奖励。试做了两个事件和4瓶药水。需要BaseMod和STSLib支持。

cards.name: 1 Man
cards.description: Draw 1 cards. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 1 Man+
cards.description: Draw 2 cards. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 1 Pin
cards.description: Gain 1 Block. Next turn, Gain 1 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 1 Pin+
cards.description: Gain 2 Block. Next turn, Gain 2 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 1 Sou
cards.description: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 1 Sou+
cards.description: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 2 Man
cards.description: Scry 1 cards. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 2 Man+
cards.description: Scry 2 cards. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 2 Pin
cards.description: Gain 2 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 2 Pin+
cards.description: Gain 3 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 2 Sou
cards.description: Deal 2 damage. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 2 Sou+
cards.description: Deal 3 damage. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 3 Man
cards.description: Upgrade a card in your hand 1 times. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 3 Man+
cards.description: Upgrade all cards in your hand. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 3 Pin
cards.description: Gain 3 Block. Next turn, Gain 3 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 3 Pin+
cards.description: Gain 4 Block. Next turn, Gain 4 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 3 Sou
cards.description: Deal 3 damage to random enemy 2 times. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 3 Sou+
cards.description: Deal 3 damage to random enemy 3 times. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 4 Man
cards.description: Choose 1 cards from draw pile add into your hand. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 4 Man+
cards.description: Choose 2 cards from draw pile add into your hand. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 4 Pin
cards.description: Gain 4 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 4 Pin+
cards.description: Gain 5 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 4 Sou
cards.description: Deal 4 damage to all enemies. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 4 Sou+
cards.description: Deal 5 damage to all enemies. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 5 Man
cards.description: Add 1 random Mahjong into your hand.Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 5 Man+
cards.description: Add 2 random Mahjong into your hand.Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 5 Pin
cards.description: Gain 5 Block. Next turn, Gain 5 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 5 Pin+
cards.description: Gain 6 Block. Next turn, Gain 6 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 5 Sou
cards.description: Deal 5 damage. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 5 Sou+
cards.description: Deal 6 damage. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 6 Man
cards.description: Put 1 card fron discard pile into your hand. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 6 Man+
cards.description: Put 2 card fron discard pile into your hand. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 6 Pin
cards.description: Gain 6 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 6 Pin+
cards.description: Gain 7 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 6 Sou
cards.description: Deal 6 damage to random enemy 2 times. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 6 Sou+
cards.description: Deal 6 damage to random enemy 3 times. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 7 Man
cards.description: Exhume 1 cards Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 7 Man+
cards.description: Exhume 2 cards Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 7 Pin
cards.description: Gain 7 Block. Next turn, Gain 7 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 7 Pin+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block. Next turn, Gain 8 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 7 Sou
cards.description: Deal 7 damage to all enemies. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 7 Sou+
cards.description: Deal 8 damage to all enemies. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 8 Man
cards.description: Exhaust 1 cards in your hand. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 8 Man+
cards.description: Exhaust 2 cards in your hand. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 8 Pin
cards.description: Gain 8 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 8 Pin+
cards.description: Gain 9 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 8 Sou
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 8 Sou+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 9 Man
cards.description: Discard 1 cards in your hand. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 9 Man+
cards.description: Discard 2 cards in your hand. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 9 Pin
cards.description: Gain 9 Block. Next turn, Gain 9 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 9 Pin+
cards.description: Gain 10 Block. Next turn, Gain 10 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 9 Sou
cards.description: Deal 9 damage to random enemy 2 times. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: 9 Sou+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage to random enemy 3 times. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: Candy
cards.description:
Heal 4 HP.
Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Candy+
cards.description:
Heal 4 HP.
Upgrade ALL your cards for the rest of combat.

cards.name: East
cards.description: Whenever play a Mahjong card, Gain 1 Regen, Gain 1 Plated Armor. Ethereal.

cards.name: East+
cards.description: Whenever play a Mahjong card, Gain 1 Regen, Gain 2 Plated Armor. Ethereal.

cards.name: Ghost Costume
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 random power.

cards.name: Ghost Costume+
cards.description: Gain 1 random power. At the start of your turn, gain 1 random power.

cards.name: Green
cards.description: Whenever play a Mahjong card, for each enemy Gain 1 Gold. Ethereal.

cards.name: Green+
cards.description: Whenever play a Mahjong card, for each enemy Gain 2 Gold. Ethereal.

cards.name: Halloween
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength and Dexterity. Gain [R]  and draw 1 card.
Can be Upgraded any number of times. Exhaust.

cards.name: Halloween+1
cards.description:
Gain 2 Strength and Dexterity. Gain [R]  [R]  and draw 2 cards.
Can be Upgraded any number of times. Exhaust.

cards.name: North
cards.description: When you would die next 1 times, heal to 1% of your max HP instead. Each cards you play increase 1% of your Max HP heal instead, reset after every resurrection. Ethereal.

cards.name: North+
cards.description: When you would die next 2 times, heal to 1% of your max HP instead. Each cards you play increase 1% of your Max HP heal instead, reset after every resurrection. Ethereal.

cards.name: Red
cards.description: At the start of turn, trigger 1 times Mahjong Relic. Ethereal.

cards.name: Red 5 Man
cards.description: Add 2 random Mahjong into your hand.Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: Red 5 Man+
cards.description: Add 4 random Mahjong into your hand.Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: Red 5 Pin
cards.description: Gain 10 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: Red 5 Pin+
cards.description: Gain 11 Block. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: Red 5 Sou
cards.description: Deal 10 damage. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: Red 5 Sou+
cards.description: Deal 11 damage. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: Red+
cards.description: At the start of turn, trigger 2 times Mahjong Relic. Ethereal.

cards.name: South
cards.description: Whenever play a Mahjong card, Gain 1 Mantra. Ethereal.

cards.name: South+
cards.description: Whenever play a Mahjong card, Gain 2 Mantra. Ethereal.

cards.name: Trick
cards.description: Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies. Draw 1 card for each layer of Artifact. Gain 1 Artifact for each kind of debuff. Gain 1 temporary Strength.

cards.name: Trick+
cards.description: Deal 12 damage to ALL enemies. Draw 1 card for each layer of Artifact. Gain 1 Artifact for each kind of debuff. Gain 2 temporary Strength.

cards.name: West
cards.description: Whenever play a non-Attack card, multiplicatively increase your attack damage by 1 %. Ethereal.

cards.name: West+
cards.description: Whenever play a non-Attack card, multiplicatively increase your attack damage by 2 %. Ethereal.

cards.name: White
cards.description: Remove all your debuff, Gain 1 Artifact. Ethereal.

cards.name: White+
cards.description: Remove all your debuff, Gain 2 Artifact. Ethereal.

cards.name: Automaton
cards.description: Whenever Auto-played, damage times +1 in this run. Damage times -1 in this combat. Deal 8 damage to random enemy 1 time.

cards.name: Automaton+
cards.description: Whenever Auto-played, damage times +1 in this run. Damage times -1 in this combat. Deal 12 damage to random enemy 1 time.

cards.name: Backup Power
cards.description: Gain [E] [E]. If still in your hand at the end of the turn, Gain [E] next turn.

cards.name: Backup Power+
cards.description: Gain [E] [E] [E]. If still in your hand at the end of the turn, Gain [E] next turn.

cards.name: Bloodthirsty
cards.description: Target lose 5 % of its Max HP, heal same amount. Double ratios of all 'Bloodthirsty'. Whenever other card played, decrease 2% (down to 1%).

cards.name: Bloodthirsty+
cards.description: Target lose 7 % of its Max HP, heal same amount. Double ratios of all 'Bloodthirsty'. Whenever other card played, decrease 1% (down to 1%).

cards.name: Combo Master
cards.description: Deal 1 damage to all enemies 1 times. Increase the damage and times of this card by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Combo Master+
cards.description: Deal 2 damage to all enemies 2 times. Increase the damage and times of this card by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Conditioned Reflex
cards.description: Whenever you lose HP: Gain 1 Melleable; at the start of your next turn, make it active 1 time.

cards.name: Conditioned Reflex+
cards.description: Whenever you lose HP: Gain 2 Melleable; at the start of your next turn, make it active 1 time.

cards.name: Death Imprint
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. If target has Imprint, remove it and increase base damage by 80 % of its amount. Otherwise, give Imprint.

cards.name: Death Imprint+
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. If target has Imprint, remove it and increase base damage by 100 % of its amount. Otherwise, give Imprint.

cards.name: Handmade Products
cards.description: Deal damage of the product of all cards' cost in your hand. If kills enemy, increase this card's cost by 1 . Can be Upgraded any number of times.

cards.name: Handmade Products+1
cards.description: Deal damage of the product of all cards' cost in your hand. If kills enemy, increase this card's cost by 1 . Can be Upgraded any number of times.

cards.name: Handmade Products+1
cards.description: Deal damage of the product of all cards' cost in your hand. If kills enemy, increase this card's cost by 1 . Can be Upgraded any number of times.

cards.name: Head Attack
cards.description: Change enemy's intention to next turn. Draw 1 cards. Ethereal.

cards.name: Head Attack+
cards.description: Change enemy's intention to next turn. Draw 2 cards. Ethereal.

cards.name: Life Ruler
cards.description: Apply the maximum of the greatest common divisor of enemy's max-HP or HP Constricted. Exhaust.

cards.name: Life Ruler+
cards.description: Apply the maximum of the greatest common divisor of enemy's max-HP or HP Constricted.

cards.name: Limit Flipper
cards.description: If last card you play is 'Limit Flipper', double your Strength. Otherwise Gain 1 Strength.

cards.name: Limit Flipper+
cards.description: If last card you play is 'Limit Flipper', double your Strength. Otherwise Gain 2 Strength.

cards.name: Pain Detonator
cards.description: Deal damage of 30 % of HP Loss of the target ( 0 ).

cards.name: Pain Detonator+
cards.description: Deal damage of 50 % of HP Loss of the target ( 0 ).

cards.name: Perfect Combo
cards.description: Deal 15 damage. Can be Upgraded any number of times. When Attack, 20 % chance to attack a random enemy again. Each Upgrade, Gain 1% probability.

cards.name: Perfect Combo+1
cards.description: Deal 15 damage. Can be Upgraded any number of times. When Attack, 21 % chance to attack a random enemy again. Each Upgrade, Gain 1% probability.

cards.name: Pocket Stone Calender
cards.description: Deal damage of square of turn number. Increase this cards cost by 2 this combat. Whenever you draw this card, reduce its cost by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Pocket Stone Calender+
cards.description: Deal damage of square of turn number. Increase this cards cost by 1 this combat. Whenever you draw this card, reduce its cost by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Provocation
cards.description: Gain 3 Strength, Apply 1 Angry.

cards.name: Provocation+
cards.description: Gain 4 Strength, Apply 1 Angry.

cards.name: Rabbit of Fibonacci
cards.description: Gain 1 Block. Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Upgrade this card in this combat. Can be Upgraded any number of time.

cards.name: Rabbit of Fibonacci+1
cards.description: Gain 1 Block. Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Upgrade this card in this combat. Can be Upgraded any number of time.

cards.name: Substitute by Subterfuge
cards.description: Gain [E] . Choose any cards from draw pile and discard them, at the same time, shuffle discard pile into draw pile. Exhaust.

cards.name: Substitute by Subterfuge+
cards.description: Gain [E] . Choose any cards from draw pile and discard them, at the same time, shuffle discard pile into draw pile.

cards.name: Temporary Deletion
cards.description: Choose a card, remove the same Rarity cards from deck this combat.At the start of turn, add a same Rarity random card into your hand. Ethereal.

cards.name: Temporary Deletion+
cards.description: Choose a card, remove the same Rarity cards from deck this combat.At the start of turn, add a same Rarity random card into your hand. Ethereal.

cards.name: Weakness Counterattack
cards.description: Deal 6 to random enemy 1 times. Deal 1 more time for each time enemies intent to Attack.

cards.name: Weakness Counterattack+
cards.description: Deal 6 to random enemy 2 times. Deal 1 more time for each time enemies intent to Attack.

cards.name: Adversity Counterattack
cards.description: Apply 1 Artifact. Gain 1 Vulnerable and 1 Intangible. Deal the sum of enemy's Buff damage to a random enemy the sum of your Debuff times.

cards.name: Adversity Counterattack+
cards.description: Apply 2 Artifact. Gain 2 Vulnerable and 1 Intangible. Deal the sum of enemy's Buff damage to a random enemy the sum of your Debuff times.

cards.name: Arrangement
cards.description: Gain X Block. Deal X damage. Draw X cards. Upgrade X cards in your hand, for each Upgrade less, Gain [R] . Exhaust.

cards.name: Arrangement+
cards.description: Gain 1 Block X times. Deal 1 damage X times. Deal X cards. Upgrade X cards in your hand, for each Upgrade less, Gain [R] . Exhaust.

cards.name: Assimilated Rune
cards.description: Increase base damage and block of cards in your hand to the maximum in your hand in 1 turns.

cards.name: Assimilated Rune+
cards.description: Increase base damage and block of cards in your hand to the maximum in your deck in 1 turns.

cards.name: Auto Rebound System
cards.description: At the start of your turn, Gain [R] Draw 1 cards. Put the first 1 cards you play this turn back on the top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Auto Rebound System+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, Gain [R] [R] Draw 2 cards. Put the first 2 cards you play this turn back on the top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Blood Blade
cards.description: Increase attack damage by current HP loss / Max HP. When lose HP, increase attack damage by HP loss / Max HP.

cards.name: Blood Blade+
cards.description: Multiplicatively Increase attack damage by current HP loss / Max HP. When lose HP, multiplicatively increase attack damage by HP loss / Max HP.

cards.name: Blood Shelter
cards.description: Arrange HP with target to make each has same ratio. Each gain the sum of change in HP amount Block . Exhaust.

cards.name: Blood Shelter+
cards.description: Arrange HP with target to make each has same ratio. Each gain the sum of change in HP amount Block . Exhaust.

cards.name: Card Index
cards.description: Choose 2 cards to remove from this combat. For future play, play the chosen cards.

cards.name: Card Index+
cards.description: Choose 3 cards to remove from this combat. For future play, play the chosen cards.

cards.name: Chaotic Core
cards.description: Gain 1 Orb slot. Whenever you lose HP, Gain 1 Orb slot. If Orb slot has been full, or each your attack damage Channel 1 random Orb.

cards.name: Chaotic Core+
cards.description: Gain 1 Orb slot. Whenever you lose HP, Gain 1 Orb slot. If Orb slot has been full, or each your attack damage Channel 2 random Orb.

cards.name: Collector
cards.description: Deal 8 damage to all enemies. Deal 1 additional damage for each relic you have.

cards.name: Collector+
cards.description: Deal 8 damage to all enemies. Deal 2 additional damage for each relic you have.

cards.name: Disillusionment Echo
cards.description:
The first card you play each turn will play
X/ 3 more times.

cards.name: Disillusionment Echo+
cards.description:
The first card you play each turn will play
X/ 2 more times.

cards.name: Dream
cards.description: Add 'Infernal Blade', 'Distraction', 'White noise' and 'Discovery' into your hand. Which cost 0 this turn. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: Dream+
cards.description: Add 'Infernal Blade', 'Distraction', 'White noise' and 'Discovery' into your hand. Which cost 0 this turn. Ethereal.

cards.name: Enhance Armerment
cards.description: Your next Attack deal double damage. Exhaust it.

cards.name: Enhance Armerment+
cards.description: Your next Attack deal double damage. Exhaust it.

cards.name: Eternality of Khronos
cards.description: End your turn, Take an extra turn after this one. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: Eternality of Khronos+
cards.description: End your turn, Take an extra turn after this one. Ethereal.

cards.name: Fighting Intention
cards.description: At the start of your turn, for each enemy intend to Attack, Gain 1 Strength, these enemies lose 1 Strength.

cards.name: Fighting Intention+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, for each enemy intend to Attack, Gain 1 Strength, these enemies lose 1 Strength.

cards.name: Illusory
cards.description: Draw 1 cards, all cards in draw pile become Ethereal. For each card was Ethereal, Gain [E]. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: Illusory+
cards.description: Draw 2 cards, all cards in draw pile become Ethereal. For each card was Ethereal, Gain [E]. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: Librarian
cards.description: Choose 1 cards from X random Colorless to add in your hand. Reduce these cards'cost to 0 this combat. Exhaust.

cards.name: Librarian+
cards.description: Choose 1 cards from X random Colorless to add in your hand. Reduce these cards' cost to 0 this combat. If win in the next X turn, add these cards in your deck. Exhaust.

cards.name: Mystery
cards.description: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy 1 times. For each ? room you entered this run, deal an extra damage. Exhaust.

cards.name: Mystery+
cards.description: Deal 6 damage to a random enemy 1 times. For each ? room you entered this run, deal an extra damage. Exhaust.

cards.name: Power Strike
cards.description: Ethereal. Reduce all enemies' HP to its logarithm, the base number is 1. 5 . Apply the number of enemies Intangible to all enemies. Can be Upgraded any number of time. Exhaust.

cards.name: Power Strike+1
cards.description: Ethereal. Reduce all enemies' HP to its logarithm, the base number is 1. 6 . Apply the number of enemies Intangible to all enemies. Can be Upgraded any number of time. Exhaust.

cards.name: Pulse Distributor
cards.description: When you would receive n damage which is not type Lose HP, don't lose HP. Instead, in the next n+1 times of enemies turn end, lose 1 HP.

cards.name: Pulse Distributor+
cards.description: When you would receive n damage which is not type Lose HP, don't lose HP. Instead, in the next n times of enemies turn end, lose 1 HP.

cards.name: Recap
cards.description: At the start of your turn, play the last 1 cards you played last turn.

cards.name: Recap+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, play the last 1 cards you played last turn.

cards.name: Reflect
cards.description: In this turn, you will play the next 1 cards twice except Curse and Status.

cards.name: Reflect+
cards.description: In this turn, you will play the next 2 cards twice except Curse and Status.

cards.name: Repeat Form
cards.description: Choose a card and remove it this combat. At the start of your turn, add a copy of it into your hand. Ethereal.

cards.name: Repeat Form+
cards.description: Choose a card and remove it this combat. At the start of your turn, add a copy of it into your hand.

cards.name: Reproduce
cards.description: Innate . Choose a card, make it Retain, goes back hand when played, increase its cost in turn by 1 .

cards.name: Reproduce+
cards.description: Innate . Choose a card, make it Retain, goes back hand when played, increase its cost in turn by 1 .

cards.name: Reverberation
cards.description: Whenever a card except Curse or Status Exhausts, function it 1 times. Ethereal.

cards.name: Reverberation+
cards.description: Whenever a card except Curse or Status Exhausts, function it 1 times.

cards.name: Self Regulating System
cards.description: The first buff you Gain each turn will receive 1 more. The first debuff you Gain each turn will receive 1 fewer.

cards.name: Self Regulating System+
cards.description: Innate. The first buff you Gain each turn will receive 1 more. The first debuff you Gain each turn will receive 1 fewer.

cards.name: Shut Down
cards.description: At the start of each turn, add 1 'Reboot' into your hand.

cards.name: Shut Down+
cards.description: At the start of each turn, add 1 'Reboot+' into your hand.

cards.name: Superconductor
cards.description: In this turn, you can Gain no [E] , reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 0. Reduce cost of next X cards you draw which greater than 0 by 1 for one turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Superconductor+
cards.description: In this turn, you cannot Gain [E] , reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 0. Reduce cost of next X cards you draw which greater than 0 by 1 for one turn.

cards.name: Taurus' Black Cat
cards.description: Whenever you deal non-Lose-HP damage to enemy, all enemies lose 75 % of the damage HP in total.

cards.name: Taurus' Black Cat+
cards.description: Whenever you deal non-Lose-HP damage to enemy, all enemies lose 100 % of the damage HP in total.

cards.name: Trade In
cards.description: Exhaust any number of cards in your hand, then draw that many cards, reduce the cost of all cards in your hand by 1 and make them Exhaust on play. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: Trade In+
cards.description: Exhaust any number of cards in your hand, then draw that many cards, reduce the cost of all cards in your hand by 2 and make them Exhaust on play. Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: Treasure Hunter
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. Choose a card from 3 random Rare card add into your hand. Exhaust.

cards.name: Treasure Hunter+
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. Choose a card from 3 random Rare card add into your hand. If Fatal, add it into deck. Exhaust.

cards.name: Wormhole
cards.description: Choose a card in your draw pile, discard pile or cards in your hand. Play the chosen card and Exhaust it.

cards.name: Wormhole+
cards.description: Choose a card in your draw pile, discard pile or cards in your hand. Play the chosen card. If it is Curse or Status, Exhaust it.

cards.name: Envy
cards.description: Unplayable. While in hand, you cannot play Status and Curse. If no ememy intends to attack/ inflict a Negative Effect on you or defend/ use a buff, you cannot play Attact/ Skill/ Power.

cards.name: Gluttony
cards.description: Unplayable. When Max HP is raised, Add a copy of this card into your deck. If transformed or removed from your deck, lose ！M% Max HP.

cards.name: Greed
cards.description: Unplayable. At the end of your turn drawing this card, For each [E] remain, draw 1 fewer cards next turn. For each card in hand, gain 1 less [E] next turn.

cards.name: Lust
cards.description: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, lose 1 Strength, Dexterity, Focus, gain 3 Vulnerable, Weak, Frail.

cards.name: Sloth
cards.description: Unplayable. After your second turn starts, While in hand, you cannot play more cards than the least turn. There is no escape from this Curse at frist turn.

cards.name: Wrath
cards.description: Unplayable. When you draw this card, Apply 1 Angry to All enemies. While in hand, you can only play Attack. Ethereal.

relics.name: Antiphasic
relics.description: Whenever you would lose HP not less than 25% Max HP, increase your Max HP by 5 before you lose HP. This relic will NOT be active when your Max HP and the damage amount are both 1.
relics.flavorText: 我想要挨一顿毒打！

relics.name: Industrial Revolution
relics.description: Enemies that had Artifact, will not be able to give positive effects to themselves, nor negative effects to player.
relics.flavorText: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。

relics.name: One Hit Wonder
relics.description: Whenever your HP is 1: your attack has half chance cause non-Boss target to die; Boss enemies' damage is decreased by 50%, Boss enemies receive 50% more attack damage and unblocked non-attack damage.
relics.flavorText: 你已知晓死亡。

relics.name: The Acrobat
relics.description: During your turn, whenever the numbering of two cards you play in a row has different change direction from the previous one, gain 1 gold.
relics.flavorText: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。

relics.name: Assault Learning
relics.description: At the start of each turn, pgrade the first upgradable card from top of your draw pile for rest of combat.
relics.flavorText: 停一下，让我先学一学。

relics.name: Balanced Periapt
relics.description: Your Max HP will never change anymore. Whenever you would change your Max HP, change your HP instead by a factor of 3 if increase, 1 if decrease.
relics.flavorText: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。

relics.name: Heart Of Da Vinci
relics.description:
Other character's relics are now obtainable.
Whenever you pickup another character's relic, choose and add 1 of 20 of that character's cards to your deck.
relics.flavorText: 你现在感觉到你仿佛能接受所有恩惠。

relics.name: Hope
relics.description: Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, you have a probablity of 0.618% to be fully healed and make all enemies die. Whenever you don't have any cards in your hand, you have a probablity of 6.18% to choose copies of a maximum of 10 cards in your deck to put into your hand. Whenever receive attack damage without active, the probablity will be increased by a flat 0.618% till it actives.
relics.flavorText: “希望是坚韧的拐杖，忍耐是旅行袋，携带它们，人可以登上永恒之旅。” —— 罗素

relics.name: Life Armor
relics.description: Whenever you lose HP in combat, gain same amount of Block, and increase future Block gain through this relic by 1 for this combat.
relics.flavorText: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。

relics.name: The Dragon Star Hat
relics.description: Whenever you Rest, increase Charge Capacity by 1. Whenever you enter a Rest Site, get fully charged. Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start next few combat with Charge amount of Strength and reduce it by 1.
relics.flavorText: 并没有在偷懒。

relics.name: The Motorcycle
relics.description:
When you are in the first turn of Non-Boss combat, you may right click on this relic to escape.
(Disabled for one combat after SL)
relics.flavorText: 人生不能重来。

relics.name: Black Framed Glasses
relics.description: At the start of each turn, heal 1 HP, every enemies lose 1 HP. Whenever yoou would receive a unblocked damage not less than half of your Max HP, reduce it to 1; if it comes from yourself, reduce it to 0.
relics.flavorText: 这个眼镜让你感觉还能再撑一秒。

relics.name: Bouquet With Thorns
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Throns. Whenever being attacked, gain 1 Throns; whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, gain 1 extra Throns. Whenever damaged by losing HP, gain 1 Throns for each HP lost in this damage.
relics.flavorText: 捧着这束花，你仿佛不再需要击退你的敌人。

relics.name: Brilliant
relics.description: Whenever an enemy dies and at the start of each combat, deal an damage of half of your gold to the power of 2/3 to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: 壕气逼人

relics.name: Casing Shield
relics.description: Whenever you gain Block, increase future Block gain by 1 for this turn.
relics.flavorText: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。

relics.name: Constraint Periapt
relics.description: Start combats with 1 Burn in your draw pile. For each card that is Unplayable in your hand when you end your turn with, heal 1 and deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: 交锋才不是最菜的呢！

relics.name: Crystal Shield
relics.description: If you have gained any Block in your turn, gain 1 Blur when this turn ends.
relics.flavorText: 你构筑的防御，透过这个护盾后，看起来仿佛被模糊了。

relics.name: Cyclic Periapt
relics.description: Cards which would Exhaust when played will instead discard at the first time.
relics.flavorText: 不准走！再来一次。

relics.name: Déjàvu
relics.description: If you end your turn without energy, and ALL the cards played this turn have same card type, add the copies of these cards into your hand, which cost 0 until the end of turn and Exhaust when played.
relics.flavorText: Déjàvu.

relics.name: Equal Treatment
relics.description: The first card you played which is targeting to single enemy each turn will also affect ALL other enemies.
relics.flavorText: 一个都跑不了。

relics.name: Fatal Chain
relics.description: Whenever you kills an enemy, deal a damage of 271.8% of the overkill of the fatal damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Die! Die! Die!

relics.name: Fortitude
relics.description: If you end your turn without Block, gain 3 Strength.
relics.flavorText: “勇敢不在于能够蔑视危险，而在于认请危险、战胜危险。” —— 布勒森东

relics.name: Infection Source
relics.description: Your attack damage is decreased by 50%. All enemies that attacked by you will gain same amount of Poison as the damage amount they should receive, however they will only lose 1 HP from your attack.
relics.flavorText: 你感到自己变得虚弱了，但同时变得能操纵病毒。

relics.name: Injury Resistance
relics.description:
Whenever you lose HP, ALL future final HP loss would reduced by 1.
When you completely block a HP loss through this relic, reset the reduction back to 0.
relics.flavorText: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。

relics.name: Intensify Imprint
relics.description: Whenever you cause an unblocked damage to enemies, your final damage to enemies will be increased by 1 till next turn starts.
relics.flavorText: 你还能坚持到什么时候呢？

relics.name: Justice
relics.description: Whenever gain a negative effect, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: “有多少邪恶，就有多少正义。”

relics.name: Laevatain
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain 3 random Curse. At the start of each combat, gain 3 Strength. Every 3 turns, for each Curse in your deck, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: “KA(兰)KA(兰)A(露)！” ——北凉

relics.name: Muramasa
relics.description: Whenever the number of drawing and playing of 0 cost attacks sum up to 2, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。

relics.name: Nyarlathotep
relics.description: All the cards you played, will also be treated as being Exhausted, being Discarded and a Power. Whenever a card is Exhausted or Discarded, it will also be treated as the other one.
relics.flavorText: 玩牌类游戏的时候可以无限制的变出Joker，因此立于不败之地。

relics.name: Obsolete Boomerang
relics.description: Whenever playing a card, deal a damage of the amount of cards played this turn to random enemy.
relics.flavorText: 你越是使用这个回旋镖，你越会沉迷于其中。

relics.name: The Alchemist
relics.description: Upon pickup, gain 1 Potion slot. For each combat, during your turn, you have 1 chance to right click on this relic to auto use your first usable Potion without consume it.
relics.flavorText: 无法无中生有，却可以复制一个已有的样本。

relics.name: The Maize
relics.description: When you play 5 Skill during your turn, gain 1 Intangible.
relics.flavorText: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。

relics.name: The Real Stone Calender
relics.description: At the end of each turn, deal the number of turn squared damage to ALL enemies. Reset turn counter for damage every 7 turns.
relics.flavorText: 最强遗物——历石

relics.name: Thousand Knives
relics.description: Whenever you draw a 0 cost Attack, add a copy to your hand. Whenever you play a 0 cost Attack, add a copy to your discard pile, and for each 0 cost Attack in your hand, gain 1 Block.
relics.flavorText: 不要停下来啊。

relics.name: Ascension Heart
relics.description: Gain benefit according to Ascension Level.
relics.flavorText: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。

relics.name: Event celebration - Halloween
relics.description:
Upon pickup, obtain Blue Candle.
You will only have Candy, Trick, Ghost Costume in your combat card rewards.
Whenever you play a Curse, add a Halloween into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Trick or Treat!

relics.name: Seven Deadly Sins
relics.description: Upon pickup, if not having, obtain Du-Vu Doll, Darkstone Periapt, Blue Candle, Curses of Sins. Whenever defeating Boss with each kind of Sins, you may choose to obtain an extra Boss relic.
relics.flavorText: 原罪是人类的本性。

relics.name: Test Box
relics.description: Right click or double right click on this relic to active relic reward or card reward. You may choose a reward from 3. This relic can ONLY active once. This relic can ONLY be used at floor 0.
relics.flavorText: 来自彼君的礼物。

relics.name: The Mahjong (Work In Progress)
relics.description:
BUG ALERT. UNFINISHED RELIC. 在战斗中进行麻将游戏，每回合开始摸一张麻将牌后选择切出一张，将其加入手牌。打出 宝牌 的效果翻倍。根据和牌点数获得其他效果。
这件遗物还未制作完成，只能发挥一小部分效果，并含有许多bug(初次战斗闪退，重开自动修复)若目前不想测试本遗物可选择重开。
relics.flavorText: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。

relics.description: Whenever you would die, lose 9 Max HP, and reduce the damage to 1. This Max HP reduction will not be affected.
relics.flavorText: 这样你还GG，那你就是个BAKA！

relics.name: Batch Processing System
relics.description:
Lose [E] at the start of each turn.
Whenever you play two cards of same cost in a row, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: 模块化运算。

relics.name: Blood Sacrifice Spiritualization
relics.description: At the start of each combat, you may choose to lose HP of 10% of your Max HP (at least 1), to choose a card from ALL your cards to auto play. Before auto playing it, if it is upgradable, Upgrade it for this run.
relics.flavorText: 血祭，降临。

relics.name: Dream House
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain Happy Flower and Lantern. Gain [E] at the start of each turn. You can NLY obtain cards with Common Rarity.
relics.flavorText: 简单，粗暴，直接。

relics.name: Energy Check
relics.description: If you have insufficient energy to play a card, you may advance energy next turn. If the amount of energy your advanced surpass your default energy each turn, for each energy surpassed, lose 1 HP; for each more energy surpassed, lose 1 more HP.
relics.flavorText: 有借有还，除非杀完。

relics.name: Incineration Generator
relics.description: At the start of each turn: gain [E] , Exhaust a card.
relics.flavorText: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。

relics.name: Portable Altar
relics.description: At the start of each turn, lose 1 HP. Whenever you climb a floor, lose 1 Max HP. For every 5 Max HP lost through this relic: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength, Dexterity and Plated Armor; you will not lose HP from this relic in the first 1 turn of each combat.
relics.flavorText: 这个祭坛给予了你强大的能力，但也贪婪地吞噬着你的生命。

relics.name: Prudence
relics.description: In your turns, you can play all the cards that wouldn't be allowed to play if having sufficient energy. If it is Status or Curse, Exhaust it.
relics.flavorText: 有bug也不是什么重要的问题吧。

relics.name: Recursion
relics.description: Draw 5 additional cards on the first turn of each combat. For rest of turns, draw 1 fewer card than the previous turn. Reset the progress every 10 turns.
relics.flavorText: “人理解迭代，神理解递归 。” —— 彼得杜奇

relics.name: Runic Tetrahedron
relics.description:
Whenever you play a card, one of the following 4 effects will become effective.
Exhaust this card, regain its energy cost, play it one more time, NightTerror the card.
You can know which the effect will become effective for the next card.
relics.flavorText: 上面的符文无法辨识。

relics.name: Saigiyou no You
relics.description: Whenever you cause unblocked damage to enemies, heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: 邪恶又优雅的不祥之物

relics.name: String Disintegrator
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Cards will be TEXTLESS during combat.
relics.flavorText: 这台机器上没有任何文字，但你不知为何能理解它的用途。

relics.name: Temperance
relics.description: Whenever you add 3 cards to your deck, you may remove 1 card from your deck.
relics.flavorText: “节制是最好的医术。” —— 博恩

relics.name: The Card Magician
relics.description: At the start of each turn, gain [E] and shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: 转瞬奇迹。

relics.name: The Determination Of Climber
relics.description: Whenever you play a card cost more than the previous one, for every more cost, gain [E] , heal 1, draw 1, deal 1 damage to ALL enemies, gain 1 gold.
relics.flavorText: 然而某些登山者总是喜欢原地踏步。

relics.name: The Harvest Totem
relics.description: Upon pickup, doubles your Max HP. Your Max HP increase and healing are doubled. normal enemies have 110% Max HP, elites have 120% Max HP, Bosses have 150% Max HP.
relics.flavorText: 尖塔住民祈求丰收的象征，仿佛能给尖塔带来生命力。

relics.name: The Key Of The Void
relics.description: At the end of combat, for each Boss relic you have, remove 1 card from your deck.
relics.flavorText: 虚空是这个世界的终极答案。

relics.name: The Negative Emotion Enhancer
relics.description: At the start of each turn, gain [E] , gain Fragile, Weak, Vulnerable in order. Whenever an enemy dies, heal 1 HP. At the end of combat, increase your Max HP by 1.
relics.flavorText: 收集，分类，转化。

relics.name: The Time Traveler
relics.description: At the start of each turn, gain [E] . You have 100 (Max) SAN by default. Whenever SL will decrease your SAN by 50%, at the end of combat, gain 5 SAN, gain 10 SAN when you Rest. Whenever you end combat with less than 20 SAN, lose 10 Max HP. Whenever you start a turn with less than 10 SAN, lose 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: El Psy Congroo

relics.name: Charity
relics.description: Whenever you gain gold, gain 1 less, increase your Max HP by 1 instead.
relics.flavorText: “慈善的行为比金钱更能解除别人的痛苦。” —— 卢梭

relics.name: Faith
relics.description: Whenever you enter a shop, gain a huge amount of gold which will be removed when leaving this shop. After purchasing the first product in this shop, reset your gold back to what it was before gaining the huge amount of gold. When entering next shop, lose the amount of gold of this product's price, if your gold is insufficient, set your gold to 0 and receive a damage of the maximum between 25% of current HP and 10% of the amount of overdraft, (at least 1), the overdraft will remain for next shop.
relics.flavorText: 七美德终于做完了。

relics.name: I Want All
relics.description: You have 10 chances to right click on this relic at the combat reward screen, to make a copy of the card reward, once maximum each combat.
relics.flavorText: 小孩子才做选择；而我，全都要！

relics.name: Magical Mallet
relics.description: At the start of each turn, record the maximum and minimum cost of your hand, make all cards with these two costs in your hand switch to the other cost for rest of combat.
relics.flavorText: 上面的文字被人抹去了

relics.name: Register
relics.description: All the powers that were greater than 1 at the end of a combat will be saved, you will gain 1 of each of these powers at the start of next combat. ( SL will cause losing saved powers)
relics.flavorText: 关机前自动保存，启动时自动读取。

potions.name: Bottled Space
potions.description: Gain 1 Potion slot. You will not gain slots if you have 10 or more slots, instead, gain same amount of random potions.

potions.name: Essence of Test
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Colorless cards 1 time(s), to add to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Essence of Kronos
potions.description: End your turn, enemies will not do their intent this turn, then start your next turn.

keywords.name: Imprint
keywords.description: Imprint will increase the amount of damage whenever the owner loses HP.

keywords.name: Halloween
keywords.description: Halloween is a 0 cost Skill card which can be Upgraded any number of times.
